    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int calcDownTimeForFacility(Facility fac)
      Calculates the down time for a facility with the assumption that each completed maintenance item required 7 days of down time.
      int calcMaintenanceCostForFacility(Facility fac)
      Calculates the total cost of completed maintenance for a particular facility.
      double calcProblemRateForFacility(Facility fac)
      Calculates the problem rate for a facility by dividing the down time for completed maintenance by the number of days since the facility was first created/assigned.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> listFacilityProblems(Facility fac)
      Lists all problems that have affected a particular facility including current maintenance requests and completed maintenance.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> listMaintenance(Facility fac)
      Lists maintenance that has already been completed at a particular facility.
      java.util.List<Maintenance> listMaintRequests(Facility fac)
      Lists maintenance requests that have yet to be scheduled/completed at a particular facility.
      Maintenance makeFacilityMaintRequest(Facility fac, java.lang.String maintenanceDetails, int cost)
      Creates a new maintenance request specifying the facility, maintenance details, and the cost.
      void scheduleMaintenance(Maintenance maintRequest)
      Schedules a maintenance request by moving the request from the table of maintenance requests to the table of completed maintenance.

      • calcProblemRateForFacility

        public double calcProblemRateForFacility(Facility fac)
        Calculates the problem rate for a facility by dividing the down time for completed maintenance by the number of days since the facility was first created/assigned.

        Returns:
